name: Greek Frittata
description: With just a few simple ingredients, you can have breakfast, brunch or dinner ready in less than 10 minutes. Microwave cooking with Steamers makes meals easy: mix, cook, serve and even store leftovers in them.

ingredients.name: Greek Dressing Mix or Lemon Dilly Dip Mix

preparation: Dice pepper; place in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high until soft, 1 min.
Meanwhile, coarsely chop spinach and olives.
Crack eggs into steamer; add spinach, olives, egg whites, and seasoning. Stir to mix; sprinkle feta on top. Cover and microwave on high until eggs are set, 3âˆ’4 min.
Let stand, covered, 1 min. Cut into 16 squares.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup mixed greens, 1 tbsp prepared Lemon Dilly Dip, and 1 small pita.
